title: Pineapple Ice Lost Mary Tappo Prefilled Pods
description: Lost Mary Tappo Pineapple Ice Pre-filled Replacement Pods are a sweet, tropical blend of punchy, potent pineapple that’s been paired with a subtle cooling effect to create a flavour that floats across your palate like a tempting tropical breeze with its cool, fresh taste. The pack of Lost Mary Tappo pods is a pack of two 2ml replacement pods containing nicotine salt vape juice in a 20mg (2%) nicotine strength for the ultimate experience in satisfaction, comfort and convenience. The Lost Mary Tappo pods are only compatible with the Tappo Pod Kit by Lost Mary , and using them couldn’t be simpler. Push in the bottom of the Tappo Lost Mary pod, allow the pod to sit for approximately one minute before inserting it into the device. Each of the Lost Mary Tappo pods lasts for a maximum of 600 puffs per pod - after 600 puffs the Tappo Lost Mary pod needs to be disposed of and replaced. As the Lost Mary Tappo pre-filled pods are available as a pack of two, they allow customers to enjoy up to 1200 puffs in total (per pack). The Lost Mary pods are a cheap, sustainable substitute to using disposable vapes , as they provide users with puffs for their money and almost the same level of ease and convenience. The Lost Mary Tappo replacement pods are available in more than 25 different flavours , with each based on the same popular flavours as the best selling BM600 disposable vapes - there are also new flavours still being released! Lost Mary Tappo Flavours: Apple Watermelon Banana Ice Blue Razz Blue Sour Raspberry Cherry Cola Cherry Ice Double Apple Grape Kiwi PassionFruit Guava Lemon Ice Lemon and Lime Maryturbo Mix Berries Peach Ice Pineapple Ice Pineapple PassionFruit Lemon Red Cherry Silky Tobacco Spearmint Strawberry Ice Strawberry Raspberry Triple Mango Tropical Fruit USA Mix Watermelon Lost Mary Tappo Pre-filled Replacement Pod Features: Flavour : Pineapple, Ice, Cool Pod Capacity : 2ml Nicotine Strength : 20mg (2%) Nicotine Type : Nicotine Salts TPD Compliant Prefilled Pods Compatible with Lost Mary Tappo Pod Kit Lost Mary Tappo Package Contains: 2x Lost Mary Tappo Pineapple Ice Pre-filled Replacement Pods
